$ year_month : chr "201806" "201806" "201806" "201806" ... 3.1 Variable outliers We want to check tripduration and age Identifying outliers using plots and fitting models is relatively easy compared to what to do after identifying the outliers. Outliers can be rare cases, unusual values, or genuine errors.
